elements.2211.03141_90880400802f919139f95c75cd428: This paper shows analytically and numerically that a vortex plate coupled to a neutral density filter can deliver a true optical derivative when placed at the focal plane of a
elements.2211.03141_344f08bcde4b60d1a8e48cccade89: This technique turns spatial variations in intensity into an intensity, which square root is the spatial derivative of the initial intensity variation
elements.2211.03141_3e5cdeded40dd017483c60770d2fb: More surprisingly, it also turns any spatial variations
elements.2211.03141_d086a77fbaafb47f5a8f64954a625: into an intensity, which square root is the spatial derivative of the initial phase variation
elements.2211.03141_b224bbe4c9fbd89abd4ddfbda54af: Since the optical derivative drops the DC component of the signal, it is possible to measure the full electron plasma turbulence spectrum optically, without using any interferometer.
elements.2211.03141_13680dbbfd3c6c3194fafbee907fd: The differentiation of a measured signal has always a task difficult to accomplish
elements.2211.03141_0a169c4adc2e781df710b26751dab: This operation increases the noise to levels, with disastrous consequences on the subsequent analysis of a signal
elements.2211.03141_bbdca3b58796450b7094105c8ef6a: This problem is common in scientific applications and, while the operation itself does not amplify the noise levels, the elimination of the signal average (also called "DC" value) decreases the signal-to-noise ratio
elements.2211.03141_0b49865dcc7ddf6839084a191e1f6: Yet, taking the space derivative of a signal can be useful
elements.2211.03141_c2e84a15bef5029e75a832bd47b11: For instance, the derivative can enhance the contrast of an image
elements.2211.03141_8432453f3bb151c9823a48713a86a: When light is used as a probe, the analog derivative operation becomes relatively straightforward, using optical systems to perform the derivative operation before the signal is recorded
elements.2211.03141_e1c9b50d341c62a8f67ba6f1246fb: , leading to practical measurements such as mechanical shear
elements.2211.03141_13acafc8b3007c4a46c6d1ad7c552: In fact, almost any optical method has its own optical derivation technique, from schlieren imaging to
elements.2211.03141_31208b09fb504c4b728fc7caf0eb9: Methods have been perfected over the years to yield really high sensitivity
elements.2211.03141_37c798dea865fa19e37ee7e2db610: Another advantage of using optics is the simplicity of doing a Fourier transform, which naturally appears on the focal plane of a converging lens
elements.2211.03141_6ea4282c2bf007312b185cb790c18: Any optical operation done on this plane is automatically done in Fourier space, and transferred back to the image when it is reconstructed on the other side of the lens
elements.2211.03141_6de8ede45c8da7cdcb0dc793b4c6c: Using different filtering techniques ones can perform first order optical phase derivatives
elements.2211.03141_4658fe3de0de86cc1a6242330cb01: As manufacturing methods for optical devices reach sub-wavelength precision, new possibilities have come to light to form the derivative of an optical signal: vortex plates
elements.2211.03141_b782f251c4fa1457b642bf03f3f0d: By carving a spiral (stair-case like) cavity on the order of the light wavelength, one can generate vectorial beams
elements.2211.03141_22737df6ac04b243c9bf000d78e79: When they are inserted on the focal plane of a thin lens, they can greatly improve the quality of the image from phase contrast imaging
elements.2211.03141_4bad9a67cb14e9a1c3bf2d1daf57e: However, a vortex plate coupled to a linearly varying neutral density filter placed on the focal plane of the
elements.2211.03141_7a5096f7e7a4a817a00e25a5d2e98: can yield a spatial derivative of extremely high quality
elements.2211.03141_f7029cb17cc44b04b8ccc0761968e: In this paper, we show how to construct an optical derivative using the mathematical foundations behind the optical Fourier transforms
elements.2211.03141_bdfc0f11ad5458e02719196b0fc6b: We then use numerical simulations to show how this setup can be used to measure the electron density and turbulent fluctuations of a dense plasma.

elements.2211.03141_2fb325554ac2f00b2eff5ea015637: In this paper, we have shown that a
elements.2211.03141_b6a55da795e32d6112444f52d56a0: lens pair can be used to perform a true optical derivative by combining a vortex plate on the Fourier plane with a neutral density filter with linear radial dependence
elements.2211.03141_16e0add43872439e8107f71361c95: It is relatively straightforward to obtain the derivative of two-dimensional intensity or phase profiles, though an absolute calibration is required to measure the plasma electron density directly, without an interferometer
elements.2211.03141_580423a2fe7c59ada0704dbcab79c: However some uncertainties remain since we do not have access to the sign of the derivative, but only its absolute value
elements.2211.03141_c5ded39362a7b72aa0e96f122f1af: It is also possible to record directly the wave number of the turbulence by using the analog Fourier transform offered by the lens
elements.2211.03141_aea9b0348d9ad73d13cc5561cf0ed: While this method is straightforward to implement numerically, some practical considerations still remain
elements.2211.03141_ee52a0f1509b89c3cc4be9b912963: Since we solely rely on intensity measurements, absolute calibration of intensity in the image plane is necessary, at least for measuring density
elements.2211.03141_1cfcdf82fd4ac2c7aaecf51741fbf: However, the absolute calibration is not required to measure the turbulence wave number
elements.2211.03141_9489df07a47f9c804b232291fcf02: Ultimately, practical implementation will require a uniform laser beam, as speckling will be amplified by the derivative operation
elements.2211.03141_fc39a6ab5f1e9d93db47478c43b46: Plasma light can be another source of noise that should be taken under consideration
elements.2211.03141_5a252267056557aad52e60293cd43: So the beam needs to be filtered properly to generate a high quality backlighter
elements.2211.03141_82016352e9102a8cbc6433289bb74: In conclusion, we were able to demonstrate analytically and numerically that a vortex plate coupled to a neutral density filter can deliver a true optical derivative when placed at the focal plane of a
elements.2211.03141_b62226b7ec871f1212260a41dbe67: The system can be used to turn spatial variation in intensity into an intensity, which square root is the spatial derivative of the initial intensity variation
elements.2211.03141_40c77d278bc8058e45f1de7ab4527: What is more surprising, the system also turns any spatial variation in phase into an intensity which square root is the spatial derivative of the initial phase variation, leading to a mean to measure phase without requiring interferometry.
